TopicTitle: Jeb's RL, even harder to scare, namesake Jeb Corliss

Articles.Content:
Is it possible that Harv (or whoever named the Kerbonauts) named Jeb after this guy?

This, I believe, is the single most mind-blowingly daring, crazy, exhilarating thing I have ever seen anyone do. Just watching it, I didn\'t know whether to piss my pants or cry tears of joy.
That\'s how Jeb entered the VAB to join KSP! 8) It\'s his morning commute, man!
I believe Jeb was just a name. Doubtful that there\'s a connection.

that\'s freaking insane. I\'ve seen another guy in such suit jumped out of the plane, but he had 2 tiny jet-enginies strapped to his legs. His max speed was 342 km/h, if he\'d flown faster- his suid would tear apart leaving him falling into the pit of no return. Some crazy things going on out there.

I believe Jeb was just a name. Doubtful that there\'s a connection.

I was only being half serious, but I thought 'you never know...'

Maybe we should tell Jeb Corliss about the notoriously hard to scare Jeb Kerman

that\'s freaking insane. I\'ve seen another guy in such suit jumped out of the plane, but he had 2 tiny jet-enginies strapped to his legs. His max speed was 342 km/h, if he\'d flown faster- his suid would tear apart leaving him falling into the pit of no return. Some crazy things going on out there.

Yves Rossy.

These guys are more insane though. They fly cm (inches) from cliffs, faster then 100km/h. One falt, they are dead.

EDIT: this man has done alot. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeb_Corliss).
Now THAT is the real bat-manning!
